name: Stephen Kindem
text: Great customer service. The pizzas are always made consistently and exceed my expectations.

name: Alexis Kokenzie
text: Well tonight it tasted like it was made 2 hours ago. Not hot at all. Total time from order to delivery was 30 minutes. No garlic butter on crust.

name: Glaiza Tim
text: The no-contact delivery is very safe and secured. We're able to enjoy the pizza in our home through the delivery that they offer.  Thanks for the delicious pizza and great service!

name: Ethan Frame
text: I’ve done online orders for carry out many times from this location and the food is consistently hot out of the oven and good quality and never had a error with my orders. The staff are friendly and greet you when you come inside for your pick up. A consistently great Pizza Hut location.

name: Jesus Sagrero
text: It was great, fast and friendly service as well as good pizza

name: Alexis Ballard
text: i called and asked about a pizza, said i would call right back. rude woman with raspy voice yells back “oh my god” and then proceeds to hang up on me. never gets anything right here

name: Star Rodriguez
text:
SO DISAPPOINTED THAT THIS LOCATION AND THE OTHERS AROUND THIS AREA DONT DELIVER TO WHERE IM AT “ALLIED”
NOT EVERYONE HAS A TRANSPORTATION SO THATS WHY WE ORDER DELIVERY BUT I GUESS THIS PLACE HAS BAD REPUTATION BUT NOT EVERYBODY IS THE SAME

name: Justin Greenberg
text: Best pizza and wings

name: ely C. Lords
text: Your drivers work for tips how can you have the audacity to place orders from other restaurants  and not tip the delivery Driver.. The employee was Alex!!!!!

name: Julia Hale
text: Ordered online. Not only did I get the wrong pizza, but the price it said when I got to checkout was different than what I payed st the door. I also didnt get an email receipt after I put in my email.

name: Dusten Carlson
text: I go here every week, I've never had a problem. Everyone is always friendly and the order is always fresh and correct. People complain too much. You know the type, just ignore them.

name: Steve Steve
text: Good establishment besides for that menace Tom, I thought I was the only who had a bad in counter with Tom but I saw some other reviews talking about the horrific things he has done to others. I will kit be coming back here thanks to Tom, aka the master of the rats.

text: It was exactly the experience I expect from a pizza but. They even have a drive-thru

text: I've  been a pizza hut customer  for over thirty years. Best pizza in my eyes. Pan is the best.

text: I would like to start by saying I love Pizza Hut and every city I move to I have their number in my phone. Now I’ve been here in Fitchburg since last September I order all the time. However my last order was horrible. I order a medium pizza …More

text: It took an hour to deliver garlic knots and  brownies. I thought I ordered 2 pizzas too on the confusing app for the movers, but I didn't and without my glasses, I didn't read the email of my order...so that's my fault. But $16 (plus …More

text: Great service at this location. Always quick.

text: Not what I remembered it to be. I grew up with Pizza Hut and had a random craving for  a stuffed crust pizza. I havent ordered from Pizza Hut in years so I was pretty excited! ... but honestly it was really not that great and expensive. …More
